text: The men's 100 metres event at the 2004 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Grosseto, Italy, at Stadio Olimpico Carlo Zecchini on 13 and 14 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Ivory Williams ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Demi Omole ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Renaldo Rose ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 14 July Wind: +1.0 m/s {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
